segments.text: Hi , I'm out of here . Here's my key .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Give me just a few seconds , sir , and I'll hand you your receipt . Here you are .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope you enjoyed your stay , sir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I only had nine little problems here . Other than that , I enjoyed my stay , and I loved the city .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I apologize again for the cockroaches , sir . I hope you have a nice trip home .
segments.speaker: S2
